General.Name: Birla Carbon (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Birla Carbon (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and sells carbon black. The company sells its products under the Birla Carbon, Raven, and Conductex brand name. It offers its products to rubber, plastics, coatings, inks, and niche industries. The company has operations in Thailand, Japan, Indonesia, Vietnam, the Philippines, Malaysia, Canada, Australia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Thai Carbon Black Public Company Limited and changed its name to Birla Carbon (Thailand) Public Company Limited in July 2018. Birla Carbon (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: 888/122 and 128, Mahatun Plaza Building, Bangkok, Thailand, 10330
